src:
Ditahan Slavia di Liga Champions, Barcelona Disiuli Suporter
05 Nov 2019, 23:48 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Barcelona disiuli pendukungnya sendiri saat menjamu Slavia Praha dalam lanjutan Liga Champions di Camp Nou, Rabu dinihari WIB, 6 November 2019. Dalam laga itu, Lionel Messi cs gagal mencetak gol dan ditahan tamunya dengan skor 0-0.
Ini menjadi kegagalan menang yang kedua bagi Barcelona. Pekan lalu mereka juga baru mengalami kekalahan 3-1 dari Levante di ajang La Liga.
Lionel Messi jadi starter di laga ini. Ia antara lain mendapat peluang, tapi tembakannya membentur mistar gawang. Ia dan pemain Barca lain dibuat frustrasi oleh kecemerlangan kiper Slavia Ondrej Kolar.
Menjelang laga usia, juga setelah pertandingan berakhir, para suporter mengungkapkan kejengkelannya dengan menyiuli pemain.
Pelatih Barcelona, Ernesto Valverde, mengakui timnya tak menampilkan performa terbaik di laga itu. "sebelumnya kami kalah melawan Levante dan harus kami akui dua laga terakhir bukanlah yang bagi kami," kata dia. "Kami tahu ada banyak tekanan pada tim dan kami harus segera merespons."
Ditanya soal siulan suporter, Valverde menjawab, "Wajar saja untuk beharap dan menjadi penuntut pada tim."
Selain gagal menang, Barcelona juga kehilangan pemainnya di laga itu. Jordi Alba digantikan di babak pertama karena cedera hamstring dan Valverde mengatakan full-back akan menjalani tes untuk mengungkap sejauh mana masalah ini terjadi.
Bila Alba tak segera pulih, Barca akan menghadapi masalah serius. Mereka sudah dipastikan tak bisa diperkuat Gerard Pique karena akumulasi kartu dalam pertemuan Liga Champions berikutnya, melawan Borussia Dortmund, pada 27 November.

MARCA | FOOTBALL ITALIA
text:
Detained Slavia in the Champions League, Barcelona Disiuli Supporters
05 Nov 2019, 23:48 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Barcelona were beaten by their own supporters when entertaining Slavia Prague in the Champions League continued at Camp Nou, Wednesday morning WIB, 6 November 2019. In that match, Lionel Messi cs failed to score a goal and was held by his guest with a score of 0-0.
This is the second failure of victory for Barcelona. Last week they also suffered a 3-1 defeat to Levante in the La Liga event.
Lionel Messi started in this match. Among other things he got a chance, but his shot hit the crossbar. He and other Barca players were frustrated by the brilliance of Slavic goalkeeper Ondrej Kolar.
Towards the age match, also after the game ended, the fans expressed their annoyance by whipping the players.
Barcelona coach, Ernesto Valverde, admitted his team did not display the best performance in the match. "Previously we lost against Levante and we must admit the last two games were not what we were," he said. "We know there is a lot of pressure on the team and we must respond immediately."
Asked about the whistling of supporters, Valverde replied, "It's only natural to expect and be a claimant to the team."
In addition to failing to win, Barcelona also lost its players in that match. Jordi Alba was replaced in the first round because of a hamstring injury and Valverde said the full-back will undergo tests to reveal the extent of this problem.
If Alba does not recover soon, Barca will face serious problems. They certainly could not be strengthened by Gerard Pique because of the accumulation of cards in the next Champions League meeting, against Borussia Dortmund, on November 27.

MARCA | FOOTBALL ITALIA
